import jax
import jax.numpy as jnp
import numpy as np
from jax.example_libraries.optimizers import adam
from tqdm.notebook import trange
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
latent = jnp.asarray(np.random.RandomState(seed=42).rand(4,4))
latent

target = jnp.asarray(np.random.RandomState(seed=36).rand(4,4)) > 0
target

DeviceArray([[ True,  True,  True,  True],
             [ True,  True,  True,  True],
             [ True,  True,  True,  True],
             [ True,  True,  True,  True]], dtype=bool)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def loss_fn(latent, target):
    return ((target - latent)**2).mean()

loss_fn(latent, target)

DeviceArray(0.38409448, dtype=float32)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
grad_fn = jax.grad(loss_fn, argnums=0)
grad_fn(latent, target)

DeviceArray([[-0.07818249, -0.00616071, -0.03350076, -0.05016769],
             [-0.10549767, -0.10550068, -0.11773955, -0.01672798],
             [-0.04986063, -0.03649092, -0.12242694, -0.00376127],
             [-0.02094467, -0.09845761, -0.10227188, -0.10207444]],            dtype=float32)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
init_fn, update_fn, params_fn = adam(0.01)
state = init_fn(latent)
params_fn(state)

DeviceArray([[0.37454012, 0.9507143 , 0.7319939 , 0.5986585 ],
             [0.15601864, 0.15599452, 0.05808361, 0.8661761 ],
             [0.601115  , 0.7080726 , 0.02058449, 0.96990985],
             [0.83244264, 0.21233912, 0.18182497, 0.1834045 ]],            dtype=float32)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def step_fn(step, state, target):
    latent = params_fn(state)
    loss = loss_fn(latent, target)
    grads = grad_fn(latent, target)
    optim_state = update_fn(step, grads, state)
    return loss, optim_state
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
range_ = trange(1000)
for step in range_:
    loss, state = step_fn(step, state, target)
    range_.set_postfix(loss=float(loss))
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
params_fn(state)
